select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tal_product

and order_no = #{order_no} order by order_detail_no desc
mapper.sql: select od.order_detail_no, p.product_image, od.fk_product_id as product_id, p.product_kor_name, od.order_product_amount, o.fk_member_id as member_id, od.fk_order_detail_status_code as order_detail_status_code, odsc.order_detail_status_descript from tal_order o, tal_order_detail od, tal_product p, tal_order_detail_status_code odsc where o.order_no = od.fk_order_no and od.fk_product_id = p.product_id and odsc.order_detail_status_code = od.fk_order_detail_status_code and od.fk_order_detail_status_code = 1
